title: Response to colonialism by the Fanti

content.description: “Whereas we, the undersigned kings and chiefs of Fanti, have unanimously resolved and agreed upon the articles hereinafter named.
content.question: “Article 1—That we form ourselves into a Committee with the view of effecting unity of purpose and of action between the kings and chiefs of the Fanti territory. “Article 12—That the Representative Assembly of the Fanti Confederation shall have the power of preparing laws, ordinances, bills, etc.” Excerpt, Constitution of the Fanti Confederation, West Africa, 1871 Which of the following best describes the excerpt above?

choices.label: A liberal nationalist response to colonialism
An appeal to European imperial powers to end the slave trade
A rejection of traditional religious practice as a means of industrialization

content.answer: A liberal nationalist response to colonialism

topic.text: 6.3: Indigenous Responses to State Expansion from 1750 to 1900
